thread.title_full: Should Manchester United hero Wayne Rooney join Everton? | Daily Mail Online

title: Should Manchester United hero Wayne Rooney join Everton? | Daily Mail Online
text: Should Manchester United captain Wayne Rooney stay, join Everton or take a big money move to China? Sportsmail pundits explore his options Wayne Rooney is ready to quit Manchester United with career coming to end The striker is being strongly linked with a move to the Chinese Super League He is also wanted by former club Everton and teams in Major League Soccer Sportsmail's experts discuss if he should leave and if so, where should he go Published: 11:29 GMT, 22 February 2017 | Updated: 11:29 GMT, 22 February 2017
